name: Cursed Moniker
description: Use these tables to reveal an epitaph for a dreadful, eldritch, ill-fated, or mechanical character. For example, a pirate captain who adopts a much-feared identity would have a @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.sunderedislesoracles.7f3820c3edc3d9e1]{Dreadful Persona}. A wretched, outcast mariner would have an @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.sunderedislesoracles.5da6735beb25be78]{Ill-Fated Nature}. Use the result alone, combine with a name, or pair results from two Cursed Moniker categories.
